portability-restrict-system-includes.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
Includes
A string containing a comma separated glob list of allowed include
filenames. Similar to the -checks glob list for running clang-tidy itself,
the two wildcard characters are
*
and
-
, to include and exclude globs,
respectively. The default is
*
, which allows all includes.
